entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY, Blanc-Sablon
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:44 p.m. EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -2.3Â°C

Observed at: Blanc-Sablon Airport 7:00 PM AST Saturday 1 April 2023

Visibility: 24 km

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow and blowing snow beginning late this evening. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening then northeast 50 gusting to 80. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow and blowing snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow in the morning. Amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 50 km/h gusting to 80 becoming east 30 gusting to 50 near noon. High zero. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the evening then mainly cloudy. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023
